import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ templateUrl: './switches-page.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class SwitchesPageComponent { public myForm: FormGroup = this.fb.group({ gender: ['M', Validators.required], wantNotifications: [true, Validators.required], termsAndConditions: [false, Validators.requiredTrue], }) constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { } onSave() { if (this.myForm.invalid) { this.myForm.markAllAsTouched(); return; } } }

Reactivos: Switches

Debe de aceptar las condiciones de uso
